sentence: Here is what else is going on: On Monday, Trump and Mike Pence, his former vice president, held dueling events for their respective candidates in the Republican primary for governor: David Perdue, a former senator and Dollar General executive who entered the race at Trump's insistence, and Brian Kemp, the incumbent.
title: Live Updates: What to Watch For in Today's Elections in Georgia and Beyond

sentence: Its early yet in the vote-counting in todays primaries in Georgia, Alabama, Arkansas, and Texas, but this much is clear: Brian Kemp has steamrolled David Perdue, who just conceded the race.

title: Brian Kemp Crushes David Perdue

sentence: While Kemp drew Trumps ire, he earned an endorsement from former vice president Mike Pence, who offered his full support for four more years of Brian Kemp as governor of the great state of Georgia.

title: Georgia Governor Kemp Defeats Perdue in GOP Primary, Setting Up Rematch against Stacey Abrams

sentence: KEMP, PERDUE, MAKE FINAL PITCHES IN GEORGIA'S HEATED GOP GUBERNATORIAL SHOWDOWN "Brian Kemp is truly an embarrassment to the Republican Party because of what's taken place in your great state, Georgia," Trump charged during a tele-rally Monday evening on behalf of Perdue.
title: Trump looms large over Tuesday primaries in Georgia, Alabama, Arkansas, and runoff in Texas

sentence: Down in Georgia, incumbent Governor Brian Kemp endorsed by former Vice President Mike Pence squares off against former Senator David Perdue endorsed by former President Donald Trump in a key test of the power held by the previous administration's top two figures.

title: Here's What to Expect in the Texas Runoffs and Races in Georgia, Alabama, and Arkansas

sentence: When Brian Kemp prevails on Tuesday, he will prove that voters want their leaders to focus on the everyday issues in their lives like high gas prices and rising crime, not indulging the petty grievances of another politician, Hogan told The Associated Press.

sentence: In the contest to be the next governor, incumbent Brian Kemp, frequently the target of Trump's wrath for refusing to help overturn the election, leads former senator David Perdue by more than 20 points.

sentence: On Tuesday, Governor Brian Kemp won a Republican nomination for reelection despite Trump's attacks against him and the former president's endorsement of his primary opponent, former Senator David Perdue.

sentence: Trump's endorsement suffered a major loss in Georgia's gubernatorial race with incumbent Brian Kemp's (R ) victory over former Sen. David Perdue (R-Ga.).

sentence: In one of the most watched primaries of the midterm season, Georgia Governor Brian Kemp successfully beat out Trump-backed David Perdue on Tuesday in what many have seen as the willingness of Republican voters to move past Trump's election-fraud claims.

title: Mike Pence Is Urging Republicans to Move Past Donald Trump

sentence: And on the eve of the Peach State's primary with Trump backing Kemp challenger former Sen. David Perdue the former president took aim at the governor one last time before voters headed to the polls "Brian Kemp is truly an embarrassment to the Republican Party because of what's taken place in your great state, Georgia," Trump charged during a tele-rally Monday evening on behalf of Perdue.
